Key Match Events: Shivam Dube scored an unbeaten 60 to lead India to a six-wicket win over Afghanistan.
A 68-run partnership between Mohammad Nabi and Azmatullah Omarzai lifted Afghanistan to 158 for five.
Rohit Sharma returned to T20s after 14 months but was run out for 0.
Axar Patel was the standout bowler for India with figures of 4-0-23-2.
Jitesh Sharma scored 31 off 20 balls, and Rinku Singh scored 16 not out off 9 balls to help India chase the target.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The start of the game was delayed by a flickering blue light around the sightscreen.
India dropped three catches in the cold conditions of Mohali.
Yashasvi Jaiswal was unavailable for selection due to a sore right groin.
